mapper.select: SELECT q.test_no testNo , q.question_no qNo , q.question_idx qIdx , q.question_title qTitle , e.example_no eNo , e.example_idx eIdx , e.example_title eTitle , e.answer_ox eOx FROM question q INNER JOIN example e ON q.question_no=e.question_no WHERE q.question_no=#{questionNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM question WHERE question_no = #{questionNo} AND teacher_no=#{teacherNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question ( test_no, question_idx , question_title) VALUES ( #{testNo}, #{questionIdx}, #{questionTitle})
mapper.select: SELECT t.test_no testNo , t.test_title testTitle , t.test_date testDate , q.question_no qNo , q.question_idx qIdx , q.question_title qTitle FROM question q INNER JOIN test t ON q.test_no=t.test_no WHERE t.test_no=#{testNo}
